<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Migrate vendor portal comments</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance_question');
var orGR = gr.addNotNullQuery('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_comments');
orGR.addOrCondition('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_ext_comments', '!=', '');
orGR.addOrCondition('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_starred', true);
gr.query();

while (gr.next()) {
    var instance = gr.instance + '';
    var metric = gr.metric + '';
    var internalComment = gr.sn_vdr_risk_asmt_comments + '';
    var externalComment = gr.sn_vdr_risk_asmt_ext_comments + '';
    var starred = gr.sn_vdr_risk_asmt_starred;

    copyToNewTable(instance, metric, internalComment, externalComment, starred);
}

function copyToNewTable(instance, metric, internalComment, externalComment, starred) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');
    gr.addQuery();

    if (gr.get(instance)) {
        if (internalComment)
            gr['sn_vdr_risk_asmt_comments'][metric] = internalComment;

        if (externalComment)
            gr['sn_vdr_risk_asmt_ext_comments'][metric] = externalComment;

        if (starred == true)
            gr['sn_vdr_risk_asmt_starred'][metric] = true;

        gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
